item.title: M-estimation in Julia
item.description: A goal of mine is to get up to speed with Catlab.jl, a Julia library for doing applied Category Theory. Since itâ€™s written in Julia, I spent a bit of time getting hands-on Julia experience by toying around with something I know: M-estimation. In this post, I code a stripped down Julia version of geex, an R package I created to give developers a straightforward way to create new M-estimators.
